Bound, bụ ihe nkiri ịhụnanya nke afọ 2018 nke Frank Rajah Arase duziri ma Lilian Afegbai mepụtara  Ndị ihe nkiri dị ka Rita Dominic na Enyinna Nwigwe na -ebute ụzọ ebe Joyce Kalu, Nicole Banner, Duke Emmanuel, na Neye Balogun rụrụ ọrụ nkwado.
Ihe nkiri a gbadoro anya na Chinenye, nwanyị mara mma nke 35 na -enweghị ike ịlụ di ma ọ zutere Elochukwu wee hụ ya n'anya na -enweghị atụ.
Esere ihe nkiri a n'Enugwu, Naịjirịa
Ihe nkiri a mere nke mbụ ya na Machị 16, 2018 na Filmhouse IMAX Cinema Lekki, Lagos
Ihe nkiri a nwetara nyocha dị iche iche site n'aka ndị nkatọ wee nyocha ya n'ụwa niile
Ihe nkiri a nwetara nturu ugo asụsụ kacha mma (Igbo) na nturu ugo 2018 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
